name: Seizure Monk
description:
A horribly stressful game i made for the Weekly Game Jam with the Theme "Meditation". The Meditative Part is being so stressed out that you dont have time to think.

I made this late at night in a few hours please dont take it too seriously, I'm tired.

You move a white square with the mouse. dont touch the red squares.

Music and Sound licensed with Envato Elements
